Katie was bored. This wasn't an "I want to just sit here and veg out for a few minutes" or an "I'm procrastinating my homework" kind of bored. No, this was a "I can't wait until tomorrow because nothing I do today could possibly be fun" bored that tends to happen every now and again. Her mom, dad, and even older sister weren't around and she couldn't remember for the life of her where they were. The only thing she had to keep her company was the colorful characters of children's programming. Having just finished watching a repeat of Spongebob Squarepants, Katie realizes she has to search for new characters to help her forget the eerie silence of having no grown ups around. Without any concept of either the guide button or the TV Guide channel, the little girl begins to press the channel up button as if it were by a metronome's beat. Changing the channel every half of a second.

Her family couldn't even scream. The titanic pillar of flesh that was Katie's finger begins to caress their rubbery island. Crushing their relatively insignificant bodies in its wake. With each of her button presses they can feel their bones creak and hearts leap. It was by far the worst pain any of them ever felt. Even when the giant girl released the button her finger still remained on top of it, preventing her family from any movement. They all struggle each and every time however, hoping that Katie might just feel them squirm.

Christy was taking it all especially having already mentally breaking and now having the same treatment physically. She doesn't even try to fight it anymore. She felt no pain, no fear, no anger or sadness. She simply accepts the numbing pain of her once little sister's still growing body.

"Pokémon!" Katie squealed as she finally reached a channel worth watching after almost 300 failed attempts. She puts the remote down on the couch next to her feet and laid back to enjoy the show. She had absolutely no clue that her family was...

11111111112.content:
After a fifteen minute walk while resisting the urge to swing her arms, Katie steps past the automated doors and into the neighborhood market. She looks back and forth without taking another step, not having any idea as where to start.

"We don't need food Katie! We need to get back home to daddy's big button thingy..." her father begins, unaware that she cannot hear a word of it. He tried to move as to better get her attention, but between the sweat of her finger and its fresh coat of saliva she used to stick them in place, nobody could move an inch.

"Where would daddy go?" Katie asked herself as she began to walk towards the mountain range of isles before her. She gets about halfway through the first isle when a something finally occurs to her, "I... I don't have any money. Mommy and daddy wouldn't want me to steal. I guess I have to go back."

Hearing her revelation, her father sighs in relief, "Alright Katie, good girl. Now just head back home and we can sort out everything."

As turns and begins making her way back to the door, something catches her attention. A young woman behind a table yells, "Free samples!"

Katie picks up one of the ice cream sandwiches, careful to use the hand not covered in her family. The woman behind the counter looks at her as she does, "Excuse me dear. My I ask if your mommy or daddy is here with you?"

"Yup. Daddy always comes with me. He's hanging around keeping an eye on me, " Katie smiles and stirs at her free hand. "And Mommy and big sis are together right now. It's okay, I know not to talk to strangers."

Katie's family groans as she does just that.

"So you dad is here with you?" the woman asks not completely sure what the girl meant. "In that case, why don't you take this one too."

She hands out a second ice cream towards Katie's free hand, completely unaware of the shrunken humans are desperate for survival.

"Oh cool!" Katie squeaks as she reaches for the ice cream. Having only the best intentions remembering her father's love for sweets, completely forgetting of the possible dangers. Her family began to scream. Instead of grabbing the ice cream however, Katie holds out her hand, allowing the woman to place it in her palm and clear of endangering her family.

...

Doing her best to keep her hand level, Katie begins to make her way back home. She fails to take account for one thing however, as the ice cream begins to melt. She first notices the one in her free hand. Deciding there no reason not to she begins to eat it, not noticing the other begins to melt just as fast. She is about halfway done eating as she reaches the door, "Uh oh. I don't have any free hand to get key."

She looks down at a welcome mat envisioning the hidden key underneath it. She quickly finishes off the first ice cream sandwich and begins her thought process from there, "If I move Daddy's ice cream to my free hand, I can reach for the key with my free hand!"

Her family watches as she transitions the island of ice cream to her other hand. She begins to reach for the mat, when something occurs to her yet again, "But if I pick up the mat with this hand... I can't pick up the key."

"Sorry Daddy, but i need to eat your ice cream or leave it outside," Katie tells her father as well as herself and she begins to eat the second sandwich herself. After a few king sized bites, the relatively giant girl devours yet another ice cream. "Don't worry Daddy, they were fat free so they are healthy!"

She licks the fingers of free hand. She reaches for the mat and raises it to reveal a key. As her father sighs out of misguided relief, Katie's natural reflex kicks in. Not even paying the least bit of attention, she raises her entire family to her still watering mouth...
111111111121.title: a new non-fat ice cream sandwich.

The miniature family screamed in terror as the massive girl began to stick finger after finger into her mouth, eventually placing her entire family into the watery cave that was her mouth while she grasped the key from under the welcome mat and entered the home. Without a second thought she placed the box of fat free ice cream bars into her freezer and gleefully made her way to the couch to start her daily routine of watching cartoons.

Unknown to the gigantic daughter her tongue was wishing and washing her family through her mouth as she was cleaning bits of previously eaten ice cream bars. The massive wet and pink muscle slurped and slapped against her family time after time after time, it was a wonder they were able to stick together as they continue to panic and pound against the walls of her mouth in attempts to get her attention.

"KATIE! Let us out!" Yelled out Derek.

"MMM! THOSE WERE PRETTY GOOD! I COULD REALLY GO FOR ANOTHER ONE..."

11111111112111.content:
Never expecting their greatest fear to be the sight of a frozen treat, Katie's entire family watched in horror as the titanic object descended upon them. Try as they might to escape, the slippery slopes of her tongue prevented any of them from escaping.

"Mmm..." the giant girl giggled as she took her first taste of the ice cream sandwich. She made extra care not to use her finger that her microscopic family had previously inhabited, completely forgetting that she licked them clean. Katie slowly started licking and slurping away at the ice cream, wanting to savor this one rather than scarf it down like the two before it.

As she did however, her family was trapped underneath the immense weight of the sandwich, only to be used as an expansion of the 11 year-old's tongue. All they could taste or see was the chocolate bar followed by a glacier of vanilla ice cream. As they screamed Katie unintentionally force fed them what could easily be their last meal. The shrunken family finally ceased their unheard screams the mix of vanilla and saliva successfully downed them out. The pressure alone beginning to become too much for their little bodies to handle. Just as they were beginning to accept their fate, some of the pressure lifted as Katie pulled the ice cream back out of her mouth, with her family still trapped in their vanilla prison. Katie's father opened his eyes as he once again heard the screams of his wife and oldest daughter being almost drowned out by the innocent laughter of his youngest. He looked down as the distance between himself and his daughter's mountainous tongue grew greater, only to realize that the ice cream was one scream short.

"Help me! Please don't..." Ray screamed, trying to swim through Katie's marches of saliva, vanilla, and cookie bits flooding the tip of her tongue. Katie's father reached for his friend's hand, knowing full wall that the distance between them was too great. Seeing that Katie had yet to close her mouth, her father couldn't help but hope for his friend's safe return. Only after he began to pray did a large object pass by the ice cream sandwich full speed to Katie's mouth.

It was a can of root beer that Ray himself had brought for Katie just as he did every time that he came over to work with her dad. Ray's field of view was cut from the outside world, as the open can reached Katie's lips. The soft drink hit Ray's body hard like a hurricane, knocking him back. Try as he might to hold on, all it did was cause the incoming tides to forcefully press his body again the little girl's taste buds as she happily drank.

"Mmm... nothing like root beer and ice cream," Katie swallowed, unknown to her of the once full grown man she just barely tasted. Assuming it was little more than a random sprinkle, she opened her mouth once again revealing that Ray was nowhere to be seen. Stricken with the worst grief imaginable, Katie's only snapped out of it once he saw his daughter's intense and close up gaze to his exact location...
11111111112111.title: Turned into a Sweet Treat...

"Alright guys, we'll just wait for a little bit and the ice cream will melt on its own!" Katie said cheerfully. With that she began watching intently, keeping her eyes locked on the tiny specks that were her family. Nothing could shake her from her awe-inspiring focus.

She lasted all of three minutes before getting bored. "This is taking forever!" Katie groaned, blowing a strand of hair from her face. "There's gotta be a quick way to do this..." She pondered for a while before coming up with a genius plan.

The Howards' world began to shake yet again as the young girl lifted their sweet prison. The ice cream had just began melting, creating a mudslide-like environment. They had no idea what Katie had in mind until they came to a stop in front of her towering, rosy lips.

"Alright, new plan. I'm gonna lick you guys out. It'll be way faster!" Katie said cheerily to dismay of the miniaturized people on the bite-sized last bit of the ice cream sandwich. Her world-filling, pink tongue drooped out, salivating at the prospect of more vanilla and chocolatey goodness. Oblivious to their screams of disapproval, Katie happily lapped them up with ease.

Her family slammed into the wall of tastebuds with a low "SPLAT!". Yet again, they were caught in a thick mire of ice cream and saliva in the center of the tongue. Darkness washed over them as the colossal teeth closed around them. Having been almost eaten already, albeit by a then unaware Katie, they couldn't help but panic. They were sloshed around momentarily by the expansive, slimy muscle as an earth-rattling hum of satisfaction was bellowed from the throat behind them. A few seconds later light spilled back in as Katie opened up.

Katie grabbed a napkin from the counter and spat in to it. "Gross..." she said, bringing it to her face. Sure enough, there they were. Her plan went perfectly.

"See. Great idea! Now we can..."

"I don't remember these thingies in the last ice cream sandwich...must have ate it too fast." Katie smiled and took another delicious bite. Her father, mother, and sister were once again entered into her mouth, slurped and smacked by her tongue.

"I can't take this much longer..." Katie's father muttered, feeling that pressure come on again, as Katie separated her family's piece of the ice cream sandwich from the rest. She chewed it up loudly and without care. It's just ice cream!

"Nooooo!!" Katie's sister screamed as one of the 11-year-old's massive teeth came down on her, crushing her instantly. The vanilla ice cream quickly became stained with red. Shortly afterwards, as Katie's mouthful finished becoming a sweet and sugary mush, the girl added her mom to the mix, chewing her up. Her father was the only one who escaped the slaughter. He could not see much inside of his daughter's mouth, but what he heard was enough.

Katie gulped down her mouthful, sending the ice cream, her dad, and what was left of her mom and sis down her throat. In a short time, the snacks fell into her stomach with a splash.

"Shelly! Christy! Ray!" Derek called out, in the hot and humid stomach which smelled like rotting vanilla and root beer. He received no response. Katie, meanwhile, took another few gulps of her root beer.

"Ahh~" Katie sighed in glee. "So good!" The root beer soaked her father and swept him fully into the digesting mix. Katie's stomach started to rumble, which further shook him up. He felt pockets of air floating past him and heard the surface of the mushy pool start to fizzle and bubble.

Katie placed a hand on her belly and burped loudly. The hot gas left her mouth with a sweet scent. She smacked her tongue around in her mouth. "Not as good coming back up." Katie concluded about her snack after burping.

Outside, Katie felt her stomach rumble violently, and heard its gurgly roar as it is trying hard to overpower this little nuisance inside of it.

"Ugh, maybe I shouldn't have eaten all that ice cream..." Katie said, feeling her belly has expanded slightly from its usual flat position. She rubbed her firm and full tummy and moaned again. Suddenly, Katie patted her chest and let out an airy burp in her mouth, of which she blew the hot smelly air out in an exhale of relief.

Katie felt Derek struggling inside of her and recognized it as more stomach pains. "Oh god...*hic*" Katie started to get the hiccups from all the fizzy air in her stomach trying to rise up out of her all at once due to Derek's movements. She hiccuped several more times, sometimes accompanied by small burps.

Derek began to doubt that his efforts were helping. If anything, the hiccups he caused were now shaking him up even more.

"Damn it, Katie," He thought, "If you didn't gulp down your soda so much then you would notice me instead of being full of burps..."

Just then, Katie alleviated most of the problem with the loudest burp yet, a surprisingly deep and long explosion of hot air...of which Derek was surviving on.

"That's better." Katie giggled, impressed at her session of burping and hiccuping.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------

Katie was impressed with that large burp she just released. "Wow, that was huge". But the look of shock on her face was soon replaced with a look of discomfort. Her stomach was still upset. Putting her on her tummy, Katie focused on the disturbing feeling. It was strange, the gurgles her stomach made was like small roars, and the strange feeling was similar to something hitting her from the inside.

"Maybe I should eat so much ice cream.", she told herself. Then an idea came to her mind, she could ask her father for something to make her feel better. With that in her mind, she raised the hand her family was on to her eye, picking up the magnifying glass she left on the table to look for her father, but she could see no one. Her mother, sister, father, and his friend Ray was not there. She started to panic. Did she drop them, or did she put them somewhere before she picked the keys, she couldn't remember. A loud gurgle from her stomach pulled her attention to her tummy, and her memories of the recent past back to her mind. She didn't drop them or hadn't put them anywhere before she took the keys, she were finished with both of her ice creams, she had licked her free hand clean to get the keys, and while doing so, she had unintentionally licked the fingers of the hand her family was on. And that feeling in her stomach, as if something was hitting her? It must have been her family, trying to tell her that she ate them!

Katie started to panic even more. Her family was in her stomach and she was the only one who could take them out. Trying to think back, to remember anything that could help her get her family out of her stomach, she suddenly recalled the syrup her mother drank whenever she coughed much, and she clearly remembered that her mother would vomit afterwards. Running to their bathroom, pushing the small chair she used to reach the sink in order to brush her teeth to reach to the mirror. Opening it up, she quickly found the syrup of her interest. Being clever enough for a child lock, she opened it and drunk two gulp of the syrup. Running back to the kitchen, with ipecac syrup, lots of ice-cream and her family sloshing around in her tummy, although she could no longer feel them thumping her stomach, Katie quickly took the bowl on the table and placed it on the ground, feeling rather nauseous. She leaned down over it and in a few seconds, she spilled the contents of her stomach in to the bowl.

After resting for a few seconds to pull herself back together, the youngest of the family, now trusted - or was trusted - with their well being for now, picked the magnifying glass she left in the living room and started to look for her family in the bile she just puked up. Holding her nose and trying her best not to gag, she finally saw her father, partially submerged in a soft milky mound. Moving the magnifying glass closer she saw...

Unable to hear her family's desperate objections, Katie walks out of the house, turns around, takes careful aim and fires. The house slowly shrinks down for its original height to a new height of 6 millimeters. Proud of her work, Katie walks back towards it.

What Katie failed to realize was that the family was inside the house, and shrunk alongside it. While they didn't notice it, they shrunk down to a insignificant height of 8 nanometers. At this size, Katie was about twice as tall as Jupiter! Of course, at this moment the poor family are knocked off their feet as an earthquake rocks the entire house, powerful enough to shatter the Richter scale. A few short moments later, an even more powerful earthquake shakes the whole house. This repeats a few more times, before Katie finally reaches the house. She bends down and...
11111111121.title: Go outside and shrink the house for them.

Katie then points the device at herself and shrinks down to a measly 1/16th of an inch. The massive device slams down on the ground behind, its service complete. She's slightly larger than normal when compared to the house, but that should be fine. She then opens the door, and looks around for the family. She figured that they would be as big as her, and skipped about the house to find them.

"Guys? Where are you?"

Meanwhile, the tiny Howards held on for dear life as a monumentally massive Katie lunged past their location on a table. They call out to her, but it's no use as she's still nearly 200 miles to them. As she skips past them again she stops in her tracks, feeling a massive tremor. The another. And another.

Katie and the house are normal sized, but the Howards are still small

Jim heard a commotion in his neighbor's yard, and looked outside to see the house missing, with their daughter holding some weird gun. He ran outside, only to see that she's gone as well. He walks into the yard, and notices the device on the ground. It has all sorts of weird dials, with one big one that has a "+" and a "-" on it. He fiddles with it a little more, switching it to the "+" position.

Meanwhile, all havoc is breaking loose inside the tiny house. Katie noticed the enormous man outside the house, and is now running around screaming her head off. The combination of deafening sound and movement immobilize the poor Howards, as all they can see is the distant movement of something the size of a planet.At one point, Katie runs into the table, flinging the Howards onto her body.

Suddenly, the device comes to life and strikes the house, but what happens?
1111111112111.title: A curious neighbor is investigating the now emp...

The US military investigates this new threat
11111111121111.content:
Jim watches in horror as a tiny speck on the ground explodes up in front of him. It quickly reveals itself to be a house, but then it continues to grow. It grows, and grows, and grows, and grows...

The entire United States watches as a monolithic structure appears in the midwest, then overtakes every known landmark in size. It swallows up the neighborhood, then the city, then the entire state, and it's still growing! Finally, the gigantic building stops growing when it overtakes the entire midwest, stretching from North Dakota to Texas. Standing at a terrifying 1000 miles high, it's revealed to be the world's biggest house.

Meanwhile, the household inside are completely oblivious to this change. Katie, still freaked out about the giant man outside, hides under a table. The Howards, the same size they were to Katie as before, manage to find each other on one of her shoulders. They use the massive cloth beneath them to restrain themselves as the gigantic girl moves about, still 200 miles tall to them.

What happens next?
11111111121111.title: Huge House

choices: Focus on the Howards as they attempt to survive
111111111211111.content:
The monolithic house had crushed the entire Midwest. People in California were horrified to see their morning sun replaced by a front door taller than the atmosphere. Astronauts aboard the International Space Station were unable to do anything as they hurtled towards the massive structure, leaving a tiny scorch mark on the doorknob. Thunderous earthquakes rocked the world as something moved inside the house. The door opened revealing...

A young girl.

Katie opened the door, and looked about the empty space. There was a small patch of sandy ground that led to a large puddle. Katie was confused: where's the neighborhood? She looks about before cupping her hands to her mouth and calling out:

"HELLOOO? ANYBODY OUT THERE?

After waiting a moment to hear a reply, Katie decides to walk towards the puddle and take a look.

The sound reverberated around the globe, instantly deafening all within a few hundred miles of the new goddess. The world watched in horror as a 30-mile long foot lifted in the air, before descending on Fresno. The city never stood a chance; the entire population was pulverized in an instant. A record-setting earthquake shatters every building in the state, and knocks everyone prone.

The goddess has taken a single step.

The other leg swings forward, and an identical foot lands just outside of San Francisco. The combination of an earthquake and sandstorm blasts the rubble, sending people and debris flying for miles. Her right foot then lifts off of Fresno, leaving behind a 2 mile deep crater, before landing alongside the other foot. The goddess lifts a foot over the city, allowing thousands of tons of debris to rain on the survivors below. A single toe dips into the water, creating a massive tidal wave that washes away the Golden Gate Bridge. The foot returns to its original position.

Katie was confused. The whole area was nearly flat, and felt like super soft sand. She walked over to the water, and dipped a toe in. It felt cool, but was incredibly shallow; she couldn't even fit her big toe underwater! She sighs, and looks about before noticing a small patch of gray at her feet. She stoops over, and takes a closer look at the city. It looks like some kind of mold. Something tickles her nose; she gives a huge sniffle before sneezing. She watches as dust kicks up about her, and slowly settles back down. Her curiosity partially satisfied, she stands back up.

The whole world shook as the goddess lowered her head to the city. For a moment, the survivors celebrated, thinking they were finally saved. They realized the truth when the mile-wide eyes scanned over them with a look of curiosity.

Meanwhile, an airliner was flying away from the city when an enormous hole entered their path. A rush of wind sucked the aircraft into the nostril, before smashing against a single nose hair.

Farther below, the survivors are frozen in fear as the nose passes above them. Suddenly, a gale like no other sucks anything and everything into the air. Before anybody could reach the heavenly void, the mouth nearby opens, and a deluge of sound, air, and water blasts out. The blast sends the whole city airborne. Nobody remained alive there to watch as the goddess rose up to her original height.
111111111211111.title: Goddess of California

1111111112111111.content:
A rumbling noise reverberates through the sky as Katie rubs her stomach. It is the afternoon, and Katie usually grabs a snack around now. She looks about the empty space, and notices some green to her right. Maybe it will be edible? She leans over and scoops up a small chunk, smells it, then tosses it into her mouth. The flavor's a little weird, but it doesn't taste bad. She gets down on her hands and knees and licks up some more.

The military were stumped. They couldn't think of a single weapons that could harm the girl. Hell, even signalling her seemed impossible at this size. All they could do is watch the nightmare. And it did grow worse. The people in Portland, Oregon were all watching as the goddess demolished California, then turn and look directly at them. The massive feet approached with their tell-tale earthquakes,but this time she stopped short of the sprawling forests. As she leaned over, a monstrous hand reached for the tiny city. The fingers effortlessly dig into the ground, and lift the entire city up in the air, leaving behind a hole miles deep. People held on for dear life as their sky was replaced with two enormous nostrils. As the goddess inhaled, those who weren't able to hang on were sucked into her nose, never to be seen again. The few who survived consider themselves lucky, until their city was shoved into a cavernous maw. The ground beneath them dissolved in an instant, leaving the terrified survivors afloat in an ocean of saliva. This too was short-lived, as the goddess swallowed the city and its people.

She seemed to enjoy the taste, and laid down on her hands and knees. This movement rattled the northwest to their bones, but not as much as the next sight to behold. A miles-wide tongue extended from an enormous maw, and began to sweep across Oregon. There was no escape: if you were in its path your were either stuck to the surface or crushed underneath. Anywhere the tongue touched became a slimy wasteland, devoid of any life and covered in a thick bog of spit. In this manner, the entire state of Oregon was wiped off the map.

In an unexpected turn of events, Katie's neighbor Jim managed to survive the growth spurt, and was now hanging onto the side of the massive house. He sees Katie in the distance, seemingly unaware of the destruction she's causing. Jim realizes what the device was, and fires it again at Katie. What setting was it on this time?
1111111112111111.title: Katie gets hungry

11111111121111111.content: A thin beam of light strikes the goddess, and she begins to grow even larger. Reaching 1000 miles, her body becomes so heavy the ground collapses underneath her, accidentally creating a volcanic blast of debris and lava across the nation. This caused her to lose her balance, and as she grows to a height of 2000 miles she falls on her house. It collapses like a doll house, sending state-sized chunks of wood and debris flying around the world. The shockwave of Katie falling implodes the United States, killing everyone in a single blast of pressure. Katie still grows, topping 10,000 miles as she beats the Earth in size. This new planetary mass warps the gravity on the surface, ripping apart the planet. As Katie reaches 100,000 miles in size, the now baseball-sized Earth collides with her leg, scattering the remnants of humanity across her body. They don't last for long, either crushed by her movements, or eaten by white blood cells bigger than the state of Texas. Finally, Katie stops her growth at an enormous 42 million miles tall. She's accidentally crushed Mars and Venus by merely entering their orbits, and her mass is greater than any object in our solar system. She will drift through space for the rest of her life, with only a handful of humans surviving the apocalypse.
11111111121111111.title: A True Goddess

choices: Jim was going to come borrow some food today!
11111111121112.content:
Jim watches with curiosity as a tiny speck on the ground grows into the size of a house. Sure enough, it is the house! He opens the front door, and looks about. Katie hears the door, and looks outside to see she's normal size now. She happily runs to the door to meet her neighbor. Meanwhile, the tiny Howards are hanging on for dear life on one of her hairs, wildly flapping about as Katie runs through the house.

As she turns the corner and sees Jim, she remembers something...

"Jim, I need your help," said Katie. "My family are on the side of my jeans, and so is my dad's friend Ray."
Who ends up growing the Howards and Ray?

"What is that?" Katie asked herself, as she couldn't find her family. The tremors grow and grow in intensity with every step. With a gust of wind that sends her nanoscopic family careening towards a wall, she runs out to examine the intruder. She then returned before the Howard's could recollect themselves, screaming her head off.

MEOW

A massive paw slams down right next to the equally-sized house, shaking the family like never before. It's a stray cat, normally harmless, but not quite so when it towers over you like a planet! The shrunken quintet prays that it won't notice the tiny house at its feet with even tinier people inside.
1111111112112.title: A Cat-astrophy

choices: A normal-sized person examines the tiny house.
The molecular family is blown out of the house.
11111111121122.content:
By sheer luck, the cat didn't notice the tiny house and began to leave. On its way out, though, it stepped on the shrink ray. It was damaged at this point, and as such, started overheating and making sounds. Katie heard the noises and was about to check it out. Little did she know, that Ray was about to shrink something far smaller than intended...

"Grab on!" Derek hollered as his gigantic daughter passed. Each one of them grabbed on to a strand of Katie's hair, hanging on for dear life as she left the house. "What was that noise! And why is the shrink ray vibrating like that?" she asked. By know, it was about to fire off, but of course Katie didn't know that. Luckily, Derek did. "Let go!" "Are you crazy?" "JUST DO IT!!!" The four nano-sized people let go just as a beam of light engulfed Katie. Derek had been right to do so; if they hadn't they would have shrunken down even more with Katie. Speaking of which, she was shrinking hard and fast, too fast to tell what was going on. Right as she finished shrinking down to 8 nanometers, the device self-destructed, part of it breaking apart. At normal size this could just be fixed with a screwdriver, but to them it was an impossible job! For the moment, though, the family was screaming and hugging Katie, finally being reunited. However, this also meant that their last hope of becoming normal size was now just like them: insignificant. Before they can scold her too hard, though, something else happens. What?
11111111121122.title: Bringing the Family Together

choices: Take house home with her to examine it some more.
Fix the device and see what it really does.
111111111211221.content:
BOOM BOOM BOOM


The molecular family was shaken to their bones as the loudest sound they had ever encountered rang in the air. Footsteps! But whose?

BOOM!


The Howards and Ray rushed behind the open door to escape the hurricane-like winds that beat against the house only bugs could live in. Once the "light breeze" had died down, they all peeked out to examine the intruder. Their jaws dropped at the sight.

All the nanoscopic group could see was a black obelisk the size of a planet, which stood under a tan-colored tower which stretched up as far as they could see. They couldn't tell, but this strange sight was actually the leg of a young Hispanic woman named Maria. She was wearing long black boots for her job as a mechanic, and was looking for her lost cat. She had finally cornered it to this one abandoned lot, which didn't seem to hold anything except for a broken machine. "Max! Where are you?" she called out. Then she noticed what looked like a miniature house dead center of the lot. I looked almost like it was real... She bent over to examine it closely.

Meanwhile, the shrunken quintet couldn't think of any G-rated words to explain their thoughts about what was happening next. The planetary blackness lowered to reveal more about this terrifying colossus: dark blue prairies, a blue-and-white-striped desert, two unfathomably large mounds (Ray got an unexplained erection during this part), and finally, a beautiful face that stretched out far as the horizon. The tinies finally understood what they were looking at - a person! Granted, they were larger than any planet ever encountered, but the answer seemed to be staring at them the entire time. Well, at least it was now. A moon-sized globe stared down upon the house, the eye of this goddess, the decider of their fates. The humans hoped that this woman would show them mercy, even if she couldn't see them with a microscope.

Maria's eyes widened in surprise as she saw the house. Wow, she thought, it is real! The plumbing was accurate, the inside was detailed, even the door seemed to work. But how did a regular house become so small? Then she noticed the machine by the fence. "So this thing... shrunk it?" she whispered to herself. That sounded ridiculous! Stuff like that only happened in dumb stories. But it seemed so undeniable...

Unsure of what to do, the unaware "giantess" decides to...
111111111211221.title: The Godess of Repairing

"Maybe," she thought. "This shrunk the house."

What does Maria do?
1111111112112212.title: Fix the device and see what it really does.

MEOW!

The shrunken house is too tiny for the behemoth to notice, but that doesn't make it's presence any less dangerous to the nanoscopic family inside. The beast lifts it's mammoth paw to take a step, and the impact of the cat's paw crashing down sends the entire family air-born and out of the house through an open window. The wind currents, like a violent tornado to the tiny family, makes them all lose consciousness as they tumble back toward the ground.

When they wake up, the family finds itself in what appears to be a strange forest-like place. Huge branchless trees cover the landscape, extending above farther than any of them can see. "Where are we?" Katie asks. Derek suddenly realizes what these enormous "trees" really are - strands of fur! "We're on the cat." he says.

---------------------------

They simply keep walking. It's been a relatively peaceful journey so far, other then the frequent 10-point earthquakes that occur as a result of the cat moving. Suddenly, they start to feel growing tremors. "What is that!?" Katie fearfully asks. The ground quakes more and more violently, and the family realizes something VERY big is approaching! What is it?
111111111211222.title: Blown out of the house.

111111111212.content:
Katie giggles, proud of her work. Now her family can live happily in their tiny house, and she can take care of them! She carefully pinches her fingers, plucks the tiny house off of the ground, and drops it in her palm.

To the rest of the Howards, this was the end of the world. First, they hear the thunderous giggling of a "little" girl, which shakes the house to its core. A couple objects shift around on the table the family is on, nearly crushing them in the process. Next, the greatest earthquake they've encountered knocks over the table, sending the poor family into the thick carpet. They survive the fall, and get to hear as the entire house begins to creak, under extreme stress from Katie's titanic fingers. Finally, it seems like the world goes into free fall as a might whoosh can be heard outside. After a second, the gravity kicks back on, and every piece of furniture, object, and microscopic person crashes to the floor in a massive mess. After all this, where did the tinies end up?
111111111212.title: Picks up the house

All around, the family hears the deafening sound of their youngest daughter speaking:

"Don't worry, guys. I'll keep your safe!"

Katie then maneuvers her hand towards the purse she grabbed, and let the house slide down into the massive depths. After being bounced about more, the family recognize the tell-tale sounds of their house plummeting towards an unknown location. They still can't tell where, as they stood on a nanoscopic carpet strand inside a microscopic house. When the house hit the bottom of the purse, it was smashed into smithereens, flinging the Howards onto one of the many objects stashed inside the bag. They're too small to make out what they're on, but it can't be good. A shadow appears overhead as they watch a planetary hand reach for whatever they were on.

It was...

11111111121211.content: The fingers spin around the massive metal object, lifting a cap to reveal a spire of red. The movement sends the Howards onto the red gunk, and they adhere immediately. The hand then grabs the lipstick and brings it to a face too big to fully see. A pair of enormous lips fill their view, and they make contact. The whole family is smeared across the pink badlands, only now they are floating above a red quagmire. Their puny strength is barely capable of moving, much less escaping.
11111111121211.title: Lipstick!

11111111121212.content:
Massive hands reached for the inexplicable surface the family landed on. As light flooded their subatomic eyes, they could begin to tell what they landed on. There were microscopic canyons and trenches in the floor from minor scratches Katie made using this object. The glass seemed translucent, almost clear but smudged and dirty from overuse. This sticky residue, in fact, was what fixed Derek, Shelly, Christy and Ray onto this clear desert. This also meant that they had no way of avoiding the stomach-emptying trip they had upwards at thousands of miles a second.

At the very top, they were greeted by Katie's even larger face. She held the continental prism in her hand, and pushed a button. The shrunken group had barely any warning to shield their eyes before an blinding light escaped from the plains where they laid. Then a thick and towering finger descended from the heavens, planting itself near the Howards and Ray and dragging along the surface. The quartet was nearly swallowed by the hundreds of ridges in the goddess's fingerprint. They finally realized with horror where they were on -- Katie's cellphone! She was currently using her fingers on the touchscreen to...
11111111121212.title: Katie's phone!

choices: Until something stop her from playing her game for a second.

Each tap and swip the goddess child above did shook the world for thd micro family and Ray. They look up and practically beg that the girl would somehow spot the microscopic people. Alas, it was impossible as Katie continues her little fun as she walks. Katie kept playing...

choices: Katie makes a face: she's going to sneeze!

1111111112122.content:
The tiny family found themselves flying out of a window, and onto a massive, fleshy world. Canyons and sinkholes miles deep battle with mountains taller than Everest, all with fiver spires larger than the Earth itself surround the nanoscopic Howards. As they look around in horror, a moon-sized globe looms overhead. A gargantuam pupil shrinks, then grows, and then with a might rumble a pair of eyelids sweep across the eye, creating a tiny hurricane on Katie's palm. Far below, a massive noise of rushing air and wet skin sliding around deafens the tinies as Katie speaks:

"Hey guys, you can come out now. I'll keep you safe."

The words sound like Zeus himself spoke them, and rattle the Howards to their very bones. As they group together, they watch in horror as...
1111111112122.title: The hand of a goddess

choices: First contact with nature, or even a pet
11111111121221.content: The Howards watch in confusion as the goddess's face slowly scrunches up. The realization hits them at the same time the sound does: she's sneezing! Millions of water droplets are sprayed across Katie's hand. Each tiny drop is about half a millimeter wide, but to the nanoscale family that's nearly a 70 mile wide lake! Some of the droplets splash against the house, but one strikes true and absorbs the Howards. They flail about in vain as the droplet sails through the air and lands on a Europe-sized blade of grass. The water evaporates rather quickly on contact, leaving a dazed and confused family behind. They are surrounded by noises and movements far too massive and blurred to distinguish. Eventually, they do manage to recognize one such noise: the sound of crashing footsteps.
11111111121221.title: Katie makes a face: she's going to sneeze!

111111111212211.content:
Before they can catch their breath, a planet-sized Katie thunders through the grass. The Howard's hold on to each other for dear life as they are flung up into the air and sent into "orbit" around Katie's incalculatively massive body. They eventually land in a canyon larger than any other in the solar system. They don't know it, but it's actually a wrinkle in Katie's knee. As the goddess walks, the wrinkle is compressed and decompressed, but the nanoscale family is too small to be crushed. They decide to wait her for the moment, as climbing this canyon seems to dangerous to do while Katie is walking.

Katie, having forgotten about her family for now, went to go visit...
111111111212211.title: Lost on Planet Katie

The footsteps are very, very loud, but then again, at the nanoscale, everything is huge and loud.

What is it?
111111111212212.title: First contact with nature, or even a pet

1111111112122121.content: In the far distance, a paw larger than any country shifted into view, before settling with a thunderous boom. The Howards looked up, and up, and up, and up...to see an even bigger muzzle hanging overhead. It was Athena, the next-door neighbor's golden retriever. The name was fitting, as the god-like dog could have been its own planet. Athena's massive head swings around, ears perked up, before she barks. The sound wave nearly explodes everyone's ears, as they fall prone. An ear-piercing whine emanates from the muzzle in the heavens, as Athena...
1111111112122121.title: Lassie, Destroyer of Worlds

11111111121221211.content: A pair of continental holes loom over the family. It's Athena's nose, which was so big you could seat the whole United States and have room. With a thunderous sniff, the godlike nostrils emit an equally godlike vacuum, which pulls away any tiny debris in the area. Unfortunately for the Howards, they are part of that debris. They float in the air alongside 10 mile wide pollen particles. They grab onto one, and feel only slightly safer having something to hold onto. As the speck of pollen flies towards the twin voids, the Howards feel the gravity shift towards the massive dog. Where do they land?
11111111121221211.title: Starts to sniff the ground

111111111212212111.content: The pollen speck hurtles through the nose, and eventually lands with a splat, slowly sinking in a pool of mucus. As the dry land quickly shrinks, the Howards race to the top to escape the oncoming flood. As they reach the top, Athena takes another sniff, sucking the tiny people further into the nose. They bounce off the back of the throat, and plummet down to the stomach. There, they will live an extremely short life before getting digested by the unaware dog.
111111111212212111.title: Inside the nose

choices: He gets caught by the tongue
111111111212212112.content:
The pollen lodges itself in a crease of the nostril, adhering itself to the microscopic sheen of mucus on the nose. The Howards find themselves in a massive valley of black leather, with every surface covered in a thick layer of sticky liquid. They dismount the massive pollen, and slog their way across this bizarre landscape. Travel is slow, but they manage to make it a few miles away from the massive ball of fuzz sitting behind them. Beyond that lays a faraway landscape of objects too large to comprehend zooms past. Thankfully it seems they're too small to be thrown about by the dog's movements, but that just reminds them they're too small to ever be found.

The family continues walking through the nasal canyon when a shadow sweeps up behind them. They turn to see a pink, slimy wave wash over the landscape. This cataclysmic event is merely Athena licking her nose, but when that nose is the size of a country it might as well be Armageddon. As the Howards run, the tiny piece of pollen is quickly swept up and crushed by the giga-tongue. They sprint towards a nearby pocket, but at this point it's only luck that will allow them to escape. Derek manages to reach the sinkhole and jumps in, just as the wave of pink sweeps over. Does he escape certain death, or is the pit too small to provide relief?
111111111212212112.title: Outside the nose

1111111112122121121.content:
Derek watches in horror as his family, stuck to the tongue, slide from view as the tongue retracts. He can do nothing for them, he'd have to trek across the nose and that would takes days, if not weeks. Heartbroken, he continues his journey upwards.

A day later, he arrives at the top of the snout. There were a few close calls with Athena's tongue, but he managed to survive, eating skin flakes and drinking some of the mucus for sustenance. He's not even sure why he continues to walk, when he's doomed to fail any escape attempt. The world rushes by too quickly, he'll never survive if he jumps off. Then again, he might crushed by...well, anything really...at any moment. Does he try to continue survival on the dog? Or will he jump off?
1111111112122121121.title: He survives

11111111121221211212.content:
There's no point in waiting around for a miracle to reach this dog, so he might as well jump. After a day of travel, he reached one of the gargantuan whiskers. A day later, he climbed along the several mile-wide cable to see nothing but a blurry void beneath him. He jumps, and hopes to land on something soft.

Does he land onto his salvation, or doom?
11111111121221211212.title: Make a leap of faith

choices: Mrs. Parks, their 40 year old neighbor
111111111212212112121.content: After he jumped he found himself on a tan surface that expanded for miles around him. He also say many craters that could hold New York City. He could feel the ground shaking as well. What Derek doesn't know is when he jumped the dog was standing next to it's owner, who was also barefoot and now Derek was on their left foot. The nanoscopic man was now lost on the foot of...
111111111212212112121.title: Salvation

1111111112122121121211.content: The world keeps swinging back and forth. Derek just sits down and enjoys the ride, there's no way he can get anywhere anytime soon. Meanwhile, Sarah was hanging out with Katie, and they were about to...
1111111112122121121211.title: Sarah, Katie's friend

111111111212212112122.content:
The distant shapes and colors are melded together, but as Derek falls a single spot splash of brown forms underneath him. That splash swells in size as the formless blob becomes numerous massive boulders. He finally lands on one state-sized boulder, still unsure where he is. The smell seems so familiar, but he can;t put his finger on it. Looking around for more clues, he watches a familiar pink wall descend in the distance. It scoops up numerous boulders before retreating into a golden maw, and a cacophony of crunches emanate. He realizes where he is.

He's on a piece of kibble.

No, he's on a piece of kibble the size of Alaska.

And not just that, it's feeding time for the planetary golden retriever standing above him.

SMACK

***

Derek landed on a random skin cell on Susan’s big toe, which was to him at least a mile in length. He tried to see if he could find the rest of his family, but discovered that he was in fact on a skin flake inside the minuscule indentation between the two joints on one’s toe. There was no way he could climb up the Grand Canyon-sized walls. “Hello? Shelley? Christy? Katie?” he called out, his pathetic cries bouncing off the walls of skin, audible by no one.

Shelly tumbled onto the Hispanic giantess’ toenail next to Derek’s toe. She dusted herself off on impact and tried to walk, but the toenail was freshly painted by Susan less than 5 minutes. The paint was like a reddish-purplish swamp that was drying fast. The microscopic woman tried wading at top speed, but soon realized it would take a long time before she got anywhere, as the hardened paint trapped her in place. She sighed. Hopefully the rest of her family (and Ray) were safe and sound.

Speaking of Ray, he found himself on the soft webbing in between the second and third toes of this utter goddess. To him, this looked like two massive walls of skin that threatened to crush him and his small island of flesh as the gigantic girl moved her digits. That is, if he wasn’t small enough to be uncrushable by this humongous human…

Christy Howard felt pain smack her like a firm glove as she hit some strange, nonhuman surface. “OWwww!!” she yelped out, clutching her damaged ankle. “Where is everyone? Where am I?” she pondered. She was positive she had landed somewhere on this girl’s foot, just like the rest of her family. She peered off the edge of this ledge she was on, seeing nothing but flesh-colored terrain below. Just then, light shone behind her. The confused tiny turned around to see a prism large enough to be a house, only reflecting enough light to illuminate a mote of dust. Suddenly, the pieces began to fall together. She remembered seeing a toe ring on Susan that she had gotten on her last birthday, with a small gemstone at its center. She was roaming around on the small piece of metal frame of the ring itself! She dropped to her knees, giving up on doing anything. Christy layed down on the metal that was her new home, possibly for eternity and after that.

Her pain, however, was nothing in comparison to Katie’s, the causer of the entire dilemma. She had been unfortunate enough to get stuck upside down under her best friend’s pinkie when she lifted it ever so slightly. She was “lucky” enough to end up inside one of the tiny toe prints found on one’s feet, tightly bound by a small amount of sweat. “Mom? Dad? Anyone?” the incredibly little sister of the Howards cried out in desperation. Before she got some semblance of an answer, however, the ground began to tremble with extreme vigor as Susan began to walk home, tired with waiting for someone to come. This only caused gallons and gallons more sweat to pour onto the microscopic Katie, nearly drowning her a few times. It also got a lot more hotter, which obviously didn't help matters. Alone and lost, she began to cry. There was no point. At this sheer insignificant size, she had no chance of finding her family, much less returning to normal size. And worst of all, this was all her fault. “I'm sorry” she whispered, even though no even the smallest insect would hear her.

The guys couldn't find any other solution. If Christy found them, she may think they were bugs, but if she realised who they were, she may be more responsible then Katie. On the other hand, Katie knew they had shrunken, so she wouldn't think they were bugs at all, and may show Christy. Who will they climb?
111121.title: Who to climb?

1111211.content:
They decided upon Katie, since she knew that Derek and Ray were not bugs. Katie's shoes were a bit hard to climb, but that paid off with her legs being much easier to ascend. They'd reach her in no time! They continued on, and eventually made it to her shoulder.

"Alright, where do we go now?" Ray asked.
1111211.title: Katie

11112112.content:
"She'll have an easier time seeing us in her hands, as long as she holds them up to her face once she feels them." Derek said.

They slid down her arm into her hand. Immediately she felt them there and ran away from Christy, who decided to leave her alone and stop arguing. Now, Katie was a nice girl, but for some reason the thought of revenge on her father (at the expense of Ray being added along) could just not be passed up. I mean, think about it. She could be a troublemaker, and she wasn't the brightest girl either. She got punished. And the idea of getting payback was enough for her to say:

"You know what, I think I'll keep you this way and I'll be the leader for once. There's nothing you can really stop me from doing now! What should I do first?"

Just then, her stomach growled.

"Oh, I know the perfect place for you guys..." she said, thinking about how delicious the two "bugs" will taste...
11112112.title: Hands

111121121.content:
"I have a perfect place for you! My tummy!" Just then, Katie's stomach growled its agreement, "see? Your fates are sealed now! Bye bye! You've been good parents, but now you're gonna turn to my poo!" Katie lifted up her parents, and shoved them into her mouth.


Does she chew or swallow whole?
111121121.title: Katie eats them

1111212.content:
They eventually decided on Christy. Her shoes weren't so easy, but they climbed them. They didn't have as much trouble with her legs, but while they were near her chest, she scratched a little itch, and ended up sweeping the guys up onto her finger without noticing.

But a second later, she realised there were bugs on her. She tried to shake them off, but, luckily, Derek and Ray managed to hold on tight. While she was trying to get them off, Ray fell, but managed to grab her pants before hitting the ground. Derek, on the other hand, climbed up her arms.

It was hard because she was moving, but he managed to hold on tightly at the thought of being sent flying just a few feet and dying.

Should he climb the front or side of her face?
1111212.title: Climbing Christy

choices: In her mouth, as she was yawning
Onto her waist, where Ray is
11112121.content:
Derek decided to climb the front. He climbed up a strand of hair when he got to her shoulder, and from there hopped onto her chin.

He climbed higher from there, narrowly avoiding being sucked into her mouth as she drew a long breath. She opened her mouth just as Derek was on the lower lip, and breathed in with what seemed like all her might. Derek held tight to the lip, with the thought of being digested or chewed up in his mind. She closed her mouth a second later, and Derek continued climbing.

He soon realised that he couldn't climb down her face, so this was dangerous. He decided it'd be better to climb to her hair, and then climb down a hair to her ear, and yell for her. He got to her forhead, but she moved her head suddenly, causing him to fall..
11112121.title: On the face of Christy

111121211.content:
Christy opened her mouth and yawned deeply. When she closed it she felt a bit of food on her toungue, it must've fallen out from between her teeth, or so she thought. She pushed it around her mouth with her toungue absent mindedly, as she argued with her younger sister Katie.

"Trust me Kates they're only ants, I had a wild imagination too when I was your age."
"No way they were lil people, I think they were Ray and Dad!"
"I give up, there's no use arguing with you. If you find your bugs again go show mum or something, cause if I find 'em, I'll squish them flat!"

She went to her bedroom before Katie could get in another word. As she sat down ontop of her bed she felt the piece of food again, now stuck to her lip - but strangley it was moving. She walked over to her mirror to check it out. Another ant, and so conviently placed. Someone once told her bugs were a good source of protein, time to find out.

She remembered what Katie said. "Dad I see you!" She said, voice heavy with sarcasm. "But you look so tastey!" She withdrew her toungue from her mouth and began to trace it accross her lips ever so slowly. Just before it reached the bug she stopped. "Run Dad run!" she said, and poked the tip of her toungue out again. "The giant pink serpants coming for more. More stomachs just so hungry I can't help myself!" The bug was almost at the edge of her lip, she couldn't have that could she. She swung it over to block the bugs retreat, and began to slowly slide it toward it again. Just before it reached him she began to laugh. "I'm sorry Dad but my tummy needs you. No, Dad, No!" and with that she swept it up into her mouth and swallowed.



Derek looked down at the almighty gapping cave beneath him as he plummetted towards his daughter's pretty mouth.

"Christie, no!" He screamed

Those luscious lips held open to their full extent, almost as if they were waiting for him to arrive. He landed on Christie's soft moist tongue with a squeltch. Her lips were parted slightly and a sliver of light illuminated his new environment. The cave stretched around him, the walls made of a dripping, slippery pinkish substance. On one side, huge white boulders the size of houses sorrounded the exit to the outside world. On the other, a deep dark tunnel to the world beneath beckoned, above which a great slimy pendulum swung back and forth.

Suddenly the great pink whale that was his daughter's toungue began to move. The giant muscle picked him up and pushed him against her soft cheek, the slide him up to the rough roof of her mouth, then back down and around. For the first few seconds it followed this calm pattern before it suddenly went crazy. It moved like it was possessed, back and forth making whip like motions. Sometimes he was flung into daylight, before being drawn back into the cavern and the noise that went with it was deafening. Eventually the beast deposited him battered and bruised onto Christies vast lip before retreating back to its lair.

The world blurred past him as Christie began to move, before the image eventually stablised. He was infront of a massive mirror, and he could see himself, a mere speck stuck ontop of Christie's enormous lip. He began moving horisontally scaling the lip as to not fall off, maybe he could attract some attention. He did. As he gazed into the mirror, into his daughters beautiful face her saw her eye's fixed upon him. Unfortunately it wasn't the kind look of recognition he expected, there was mockery, superioty and disgust in that stare, and it scared him. He expected her to squish him or blow him off, but instead she did something even worse.

"Dad I see you!" her enormous voice boomed. Suddenly he was filled with hope.
"Christie, Christie please help me, can you hear me darling?" He screamed. Something wasn't quite right, her stare hadn't changed.

"But you look so tastey!" The reply chilled him to the bones, and he finally understood his fate. She thought he was a bug, and was joking with herself in response to Katie.
"No Christy, no! Please it's really me! Please Goddammit recognise me!" He heard a noise from inside her mouth and the demon that assulted him earlier withdrew from its hidey-hole ready for its meal. He began climbing away from it as fast as he could, but as he knew he was helpless. He could here it scraping accross her lip as it slowly moved towards him. Mockingly slow, but fast enough to outrun him. But he kept at it, determined he wouldn't end this way, devoured by his own hungry daughter, she blissfully unaware of his trauma. It was to no avail though, the toungue with nearly upon him. Suddenly it left again, and Christie opened her mouth to speak. Was it over, would he survive?

"Run Dad Run!" she taunted. He nearly broke down into tears. She was teasing with him, playing with him, cruelly like a child with a bug. That's all he was to her now, a bug to a goddess. A bug to his daughter. He had to keep on going, he couldn't give up. He saw the great snake slither out a bit before reating once again.

"The giant pink serpants coming for more. More stomachs just so hungry I can't help myself!" she boomed once again. Tears began to flow down his cheeks. He couldn't take it anymore. Luckily he was nearing the edge of her lips, she might let him go. Not likely.

The toungue emerged once more, spittle flying everywhere, with more speed and ferocity. Again it was almost upon him and again, just before it ended she taunted him again, it was to be the one last time.

At first she begain to laugh, before sentencing him to death.
"I'm sorry Dad but my tummy needs you. No, Dad, No!" and with that his daughters toungue emergy one last time, in all its magnificants and glory, trendils of spit dripping down from it. It descend upon him, struck him and dragged him screaming into her hot steamy maw, a morsel, lunch overdue. With one great heave it pushed him towards her gullet.


"I know to you I'm merely a yummy snack, but Christy I love you." His last thoughts as he entered the dark tunnel to his daughters stomach, his ultimate destination, his doom.

11112212112111.content:
"Well, after what he did to you I think a little punishment is in order" Shelley said glaring at you.
"Great idea Shells" Lindsay said "Maybe I'll just squash him like the bug that he is"
You were horrified.You know you had treated her wrong, but this!!!
"Please honey, I'll do anything" you pleaded.

But that's when you saw Lindsay removing the glass and effortlessly plucking you up with her fingers, and placing you on the ground. She was practically giggling with glee as she moved her right boot in front of you. The tip of her boot was taller than you! How pathetic, you thought. Lindsay then leaned back on her heel, lifting her right boot hundreds of feet in the air, at least that's what it seemed to you. "So long little buggy" Lindsay said down to you, in an icy, evil tone.
This was it, crushed by your wife, Lindsay,'s right booted foot. What a way to go.
Then you saw her foot begin to move. "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!" You screamed, as the colossal boot began to lower, sentencing your death.

But she suddenly stopped. You were relieved. But, not after you heard this: "Nah, this is too merciful. I want to feel you struggle!" Lindsay said with an evil grin, as she gripped her right boot. You were curious and terrified on how she could possibly make this worse. Then she pulled on her boot, tugging it off, revealing her giant socked foot.

As a wave of smelly, sweaty feet assaulted you, you realized this will be 20 times worse.

She then wiggled her massive socked toes, spreading the stench and adding to the humiliation. "Things can't get much worse." you muttered, but then, just then, they got MUCH worse.
Lindsay grabbed her sock, and slowly worked it off, slowly revealing more and more of her bare sole, slowly making the stench around you even stinkier.

She then took her removed sock, dangled it in front of you. It was covered in her foot sweat (the worse kind of sweat a girl can give off!) and it reeked. She then tossed the sock over her shoulder, having it land very near Derek. You would feel sorry for him, because soon the smell would work its way into the shot glass, but wouldn't be getting out, making your best friend have to deal with the horrific stench of your wife's feet, but you were too scared about your fate, and being crushed under the source of the stench.

Lindsay then slowly lowered her foot down, the stench somehow getting stronger and stronger every half-second.
You started screaming for mercy, but it was apparent it wasn't coming.
You finally had the instinct to run, but you were frozen with fear. You tried running so hard, but all that resulted in was falling on your back, now on the floor, gazing up as Lindsay lowered her smelly ped.
This had all happened in mere seconds, though it felt as if it were an hour or more. Finally, Lindsay's smelly sole made contact. You would rather have been crushed under her boot, no matter how slowly, then have to be this close to Lindsay's smelly bare foot. Finally her foot blanketed you, leaving you nothing to see but the underside of her sole, and no fresh air, only her stale foot odor. You started squirming like crazy, hoping some way it would save you. But all you did was make Lindsay think her idea as better and better, getting a dominative pleasure of having you squirm under her stinky sole. You heard her say something, but you couldn't hear what it was...all you know is that she was really excited and happy. Which is the last thing you need.
You were now 100% under Lindsay's foot, and it was the smelliest god damn thing you have ever smelled. Lindsay then moved her foot around, until you were peering up at her from between her toes. Then it hit you, her toes smelled even worse. "How is this possible?!" you thought. Then her toes scrunched, shoving you head into her toe crevice, making it all the smellier. Once Lindsay kills you, you hope to God you go to Heaven, because Hell is right here. then from far above, you hear "Lick" being uttered mercilessly from Lindsay's mouth. You were dumbfounded. She wasn't content with making you experience the worst smell the universe have to offer, but now you must lick it's source? Is this woman crazy?! "Lick between my smelly toes!" She said, pushing down on your body painfully. "She doesn't know the definition of smelly 'till she's underneath her foot." You mutter. Lindsay then wiggled her toes, squishing your head all around. Gathering your courage, you finally opened your mouth, placed it in her toe crevice, and moved it around, licking between Lindsay's toes. Her foot tasted as bad as it smelled, and that's saying something. You cannot believe your wife, Lindsay, has totally dominated you with the lowest and smelliest part of her body--that's how small you are.

1221112.content:
Filled with an almost otherworldly sense of power, power that came as the result of having her 1 inch tall father at her feet, Christy had decided on an action that at first, simply seemed like a harmless bit of kidding. Her dad had frequently commented on how bad her feet smelled and she, as was her laid back, joking demeanor, went along with his "rants." Too be sure, her feet smelled strong, probably a little more so than the average 18 year old girl's, but that could mostly be blamed on her intense athletic prowess and active lifestyle. She'd often asked herself, slightly embarrassed despite her Dad's mostly intentional exaggerated complaints, what person's feet wouldn't smell after going for a five mile run, or after playing soccer for two hours in a pair of stuffy cleats?

However, as a burgeoning young woman, Christy had also been experimenting sexually. Along the way, she had discovered the wonders of certain men having what was known as a foot fetish. She enjoyed this, as a few of her male friends had been extremely interested in rubbing and kneading her feet. She'd sort of decided that at least he friend Timmy had had a foot fetish, and not just for female feet, but for smelly feet. He certainly seemed to enjoy being around her feet right after a soccer game or after running. Judging from the way he sorta shook when her big, smelly, sock-covered feet were in his lap, she figured it wouldn't take much to make him happy. So, coupled with her new-found knowledge of foot fetishes, particularly ones that focused on smelly girl's feet, Christy wondered with mild curiosity if her own father was attracted to woman's feet. The more he mentioned her feet, the surer she was that her dad liked her smelly feet. The possiblity of her own father being attracted to the smell of his daughter's feet didn't necessarily sicken her. It was really weird but, given the wide array of fetishes he could have, she felt the enjoyment of rank girl feet was rather tame.

So, when she'd come upon her shrunken father a little while go, she realized exactly what had happened. Her father Derek, had obviously perfected his shrinking machine. From there, with him so close to her feet, it just seemed like a fun, playful way to tease her little Daddy, while possibly even fulfilling his fetish for her smelly feet. The sight of her giantess form and gargantuian-sized, sock-covered feet had filled Derek with a feeling of pure, unadulterated awe. From finding him instantly shrunk down in size to coming across his oldest daughter and being so close to her pungent feet, was almost to much for him to take in. For the record, Derek did in fact have a secret fetish focused on smelly female feet. And to his everlasting shame, that attraction had morphed into a deep, almost pathological attraction to Christy's feet. Furthermore, against all paternal instincts, he also was attracted to the idea of his daughter dominating him beneath her feet. The smellier, the better. Or, at least, that's what he thought while in fantasyland.

But when his daughter had actually begun to demean him and to suggest that he should actually smell her feet, he though two things. First, it crossed his fragile little mind that there was a good chance that Christy knew of his fetish somehow. Second, once he saw how serious she was about having him smell her feet, the very real dangers of such "playfullness" occurred to him. At his size, not only would it take only a slight miststep by his daughter for him to be turned into a tiny red smear on the bottom fo her foot, the effect of actually breathing in such a powerful stench on such a tiny body could be catastrophic. And sure enough, the sight, and then the almost supernatural, vilely ripe stench of his daughter's teen feet had brought him to his knees. Her socks were potent and could have ended him right there alone, but when she removed her sweaty socks, he didn't stand a chance. Just as his vision faded, as the haughty, superior grin that Christy often flashed in moments of triumph lingered for a few moments, Derek realized the awful truth: He was absolutely no match for his own daughter's feet. He wasn't at any size being the size of a flea ensured his doom if she wasn't careful. No doubt, Christy simply believed she was having a little fun at his expense. If she knew of his fetish, then she was definitely horsing around with him. His last conscious thought before the rank, pungent smell of his daughter's foot forced him into a deep sleep, was whether or not his daughter was actually punishing him for having a foot fetish.

Christy marveled at the sight before her. Her little Daddy-toy had simply given up, and passed out just from smelling her feet for a few sniffs. Thinking of her recent education into fetishes and aspects of domination, she then thought of it in terms of submission. Yes, her Daddy had submitted to her superior feet, to all their smelly, feminine, daughter glory! What a loser, she thought. She loved to little flea, but honestly, what man begs like he had? What sort of father wasn't even a match for his own daughter's feet, even at his size? And finally, what was keeping her from actually seeing how much of her feet he could physically take before she broke him? She didn't mean this physically, per se. Rather, she wondered if she simply kept him close to her feet, how long it would take before she could get him to admit certain things to her. For one, thinking like a cruel dominatrix she'd read about on some website, she thought it'd be exciting to use nothing more than the smell of her feet to break her Dad down emotionally to the point where he begged to remain at them forever? Wow, I'm sick, she jokingly thought. She wouldn't keep him that way of course, but could you imagine him ever being the same afterwords? He'd never be able to look her in the eye or relate to her as a superior ever again. No, she'd always figuratively have her Dad wrapped around her finger. Looking down at his prostrate form, she thought, no, I'll always have him wrapped around my toe!

With her Dad still unconscious next to her big toe, Christy decided to place her foot over him, but not to where it contacted him. Scrunching her mighty toes briefly, she then placed her foot over her father's comatose body so that her heel touched the ground. She then gently again scrunched her toes inf front, leaving a brief pocket for her father to lay beneath the toe arches. Christy smiled at the sight. She felt wise beyond her 18 years, powerful, like the ultimate foot goddess. When her flea-sized Daddy awoke, what a sight he'd be confronted with! Not only would the very pungent, ripe smell of her unwashed barefeet permeate his entire being, he'd be looking directly into the deep, wrinkly folds of her foot fleish. She wanted him to see it, to smell it, and to know without dbout that he was going to eventually be scrunched and tightly packed within those pungent folds soon. To add to the scenery and atmosphere, Christy placed her white athletic socks and soccer cleats on the sides of his body. She hoped the combined sight and smell further broke her Daddy and destroyed what little remained of his self-esteem.

Ray's reply was "The only thing I got is the zap and confusion fried her mind"
Dereck couldn't get out a reply to that. Then Ray yelled. "The smell it's gone and look the water going down." Ray smiled "No doubt she can fix the shrinking machine. After we made it user friendly." Now we try
13212.title: Mrs. Howard, Repairwoman Extraoridnaire.

choices: Or play with the broom and dust pan.
132122.content:
Shelly was still humming.

She was still unaware her husband and his friend had been shrunk to smaller stature.

"Boy, it's nice to fix things like a water heater," said Shelia Howard.

Meanwhile, Ray and Derek began to shout out loud.

"SHELIAAAAAA!!!!! WE'RE DOWN HEREEEEEE!!!!!! LOOK DOWNNNNN!!!!! PLEASE, LOOK DOWNNNN!!!!!", both of them saying at the same damn time.

But, Shelia didn't hear both of them.

Not even a pin drop from their tiny voices.

I'M ALMOST FINISH WITH THIS WATER HEATER," said Shelia Howard.

She was soon beginning to put her screwdrivers into her tool box.

Meanwhile, both Ray and Derek, began to ran right towards Mrs. Howard barefeet.

"SHELIAAAAAA!!!!! WE'RE DOWN HEREEEEEE!!!!!! LOOK DOWNNNNN!!!!! PLEASE, LOOK DOWNNNN!!!!!", both of them saying at the same damn time, again.

But, Shelia still didn't hear both of them.

Suddenly, Mrs. Howard began to lay one of her monkey wrenches right next to her barefeet.

At the same spot where her husband and friend where.

They both ran to get the hell away from the monkey wrench.

Suddenly, a little squirt of hot water appeared from the water heater.

To Shelia Howard it was a little squirt of warm or hot water, but to Ray and Derek, it was a huge waterfall of warm or hot water.

"DAMN, THIS WILL TAKE A LITTLE LONGER THAN I ORIGINALLY THOUGHT," said Shelia Howard.

Meanwhile, the hot water had wet Ray and Derek.

Suddenly, Mrs. Howard began to stand up.

Her gigantic barefeet were right next to them.

She began to tap one of her barefeet.

It was like a earthquake to Ray and Derek.

"BETTER, GET MY SECONDARY TOOL BOX FROM THE SHED," said Shelia Howard.

Meanwhile, Ray and Derek decided to take a break from shouting and yelling on the monkey wrench while, suddenly, Mrs. Howard soon went to upstairs to get her secondary tool box from the tool shed, outside in the backyard of their house.

While, she was gone to the tool shed for her secondary tool box, Katie comes back down to the basement for some playtime.

When she gets downstairs to the basement, she decides to play with:
132122.title: Shouting Won't Get You Nowhere, Mr. Howard
